channel.title: Server Donations
channel.description: I dont know if this is the right place for asking this: Is there anyother way that a person can donate other than using paypal, like by phone, or sending money from bank account? If there is please give me, alot of people want to donate but they dont have paypal.

item.title: Server Donations

item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

I dont know if this is the right place for asking this:
Is there anyother way that a person can donate other than using paypal,
like by phone, or sending money from bank account?
If there is please give me, alot of people want to donate but they dont have paypal.
